item.title: MoCha: Towards Movie-Grade Talking Character Synthesis
LOCATEdit: Graph Laplacian Optimized Cross Attention for Localized Text-Guided Image Editing
item.description: LOCATEdit refines cross-attention maps with graph Laplacian regularization, achieving precise & localized text-guided image editing without artifacts.

item.title: VisualWebInstruct: Scaling up Multimodal Instruction Data through Web Search
item.description: VisualWebInstruct: Scales up multimodal instruction data via web search, enhancing VLMs’ reasoning for complex tasks.

item.title: ACECODER: Acing Coder RL via Automated Test-Case Synthesis

item.title: VISTA: Enhancing Long-Duration and High-Resolution Video Understanding by Video Spatiotemporal Augmentation
item.description: VISTA synthesizes long-duration, high-resolution video instruction data, creating VISTA-400K and HRVideoBench to significantly boost video LMM performance.

item.title: OmniEdit: Building Image Editing Generalist Models Through Specialist Supervision
